arStrings.szText: The next hit against an enemy struck by {c_important}Soar{/c} is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If {c_important}Soar{/c} hits no enemies you instead gain {c_number}[{SF_8} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Soar's{/c} cloud remains around you for {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} seconds after landing and continues to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
